title: Level 3 Case 2 - RIP Mall of America
comment: Someone tweeted 'rip to mall of america' on May 28, 2020, suggesting it is related to protest on George Floyd case.
prompt: Is this video of a riot at the Mall of America related to protests that erupted in Minneapolis on May 27, 2020 related to the George Floyd case?

options.text: I think so. The time and location looks correct.
